name: Zelda? I Hardly Knew 'Er
description:
Arrow keys to move.

This Bitsy isn't really a game by itself, more of a demonstration of the things you can do with my newly-completed bitsymuse hack, which adds a bunch of audio controls, including soundtracks that change by room and callable sounds and music changes from dialogue. As such, I don't really apologise for the shoddy production values, or anything else for that matter.

I absolutely would not have completed bitsymuse without the invaluable help of Sean S. LeBlanc, and I stole made use of open-source code from MildMojo's ever-useful exit-from-dialog hack.

Thanks as ever to ruin for image-to-bitsy.
